name: Ethea: Filling The Void (Alpha Build)
description:
RECOVER AND EXPLORE IN ORDER TO COME Description

According to psychology, when a baby is born, he is born with five feelings, which are anger, fear, happiness, sadness, and affection. However, Ethea is a child that is yet to be born as she does not have feelings. With the help of her friend, a stuffed unicorn that can come to life, they embark on a journey searching for Ethea's feelings to fill the void in her soul.

Features
  • A driven story - inmerse yourself in a depth history of a fantasy world.
  • Variety of levels and art - you will have to find new solutions or paths.
  • Different types of enemies  - so you will have to be on alert to their different behaiviour.
  • Interesting mechanics - you will need to find out when to use them.
Controls
  • Keyboard
    • Move: AD or Left and Right Arrow
    • Jump: W, SPACE or Up Arrow
    • Interact: L or X
    • Switch: K or Z
    • Pause: Esc or P
Programs Used

For the development of this game we are using Unity, Adobe Animate, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe PhotoshopInVision.

Team Credits
  • Catarina Rodriguez (Game Designer)
  • Pedro Cruz (Game Artist)
  • Bernardo Serrano Bonilla (Game Developer)
